channel.title: Project Management-ECM Google Group
channel.description: Collaborative group to work on the ISOM 484 Project Management course evaluation of the ECM project.

item.title: Presentation Today
item.description:
All,
I look forward to giving our presentation tonight. Attached is the final
copy -- please let me know ASAP if you have any changes.
I scheduled a room tonight, 25 East Pearson Maguire Hall (the same building
where we have class) room *417*. I will be there as close to 5 PM as
possible to review the presentation with all that can attend.
item.author: ppr...@gmail.com (Peter W. Prina)

item.title: Updated PowerPoint
item.description:
All,
Here is the updated PowerPoint. If you have any suggestions or changes
please let me know now.
Thanks,
Pete
item.author: ppr...@gmail.com (Peter W. Prina)

item.title: Team Summary
item.description:
Hi Peter,
Attached is the team summary report.

item.title: Remaining Tasks
item.description:
All, here is our list of remaining tasks. These should all be done by Sunday
except for binding the final paper -- this will happen last when everything
else is completed. Please let me know if you have any questions.
1) Theja - Update PowerPoint slides to reduce size
2) Pete - Add images to slide deck
item.author: ppr...@gmail.com (Peter W. Prina)

item.title: PowerPoint Slide Review
item.description:
All,
Attached are the slides that Theja sent out earlier. After reviewing these
slides, it looks like we need to do some major edits. We have 76 slides for
a ~35 minute presentation. I ask all of you to cut down your parts of the
presentation to *5 slides*. This will help reduce the number of slides in
item.author: ppr...@gmail.com (Peter W. Prina)

item.title: class tonight
item.description:
All, I will not be able to attend class tonight, professor has been
notified.

Peter, I was wondering if we were going to all get together to
practice our presentation?

I am a little concern because based on the corrections made on the
draft, I might not be understanding some of my section. I research

item.title: Roles and Responsibities final section
item.description:
All, I made major changes to the Roles and Responsibilities section of
the paper. Sorry for confusion but the wrong draft was emailed. I
will cross out the roles and responsibilities section and try to
replace with the revised draft. thanks

item.title: Final Paper with Executive Summary
item.description:
All, attached is the final version of our paper with the Executive Summary.
Please be aware that all edits to this paper are due *this Sunday 7/12.* This
is an important date to hit as Mitch will be compiling all edits to the
paper and performing the final edit before we print this. I will be
assisting him with this process.
item.author: ppr...@gmail.com (Peter W. Prina)

item.title: Question regarding project tracking and control
item.description:
Hi Peter,
Following are the questions regarding project control and tracking,
1. How the issues in ECM project are solved? whether a plan is prepared to
solve it?
2. who will solve the issues? How do you allocate the time to solve it?
3. How the changes in ECM project are informed to team members? who notifies
item.author: s.the...@gmail.com (Thejashree Sengodan)

item.title: Draft of Final Paper on Google Groups
item.description:
All,
I uploaded a draft version of the final paper to the Google groups website
and also attached it to this email. This version of the paper does NOT have
the Executive Summary written. I am sending this doc so you can begin
editing your section of the document ahead of time.
- Please review this draft final paper and thoroughly read not only your
item.author: ppr...@gmail.com (Peter W. Prina)

item.title: Executive Summary Bullet Points
item.description:

tomorrow night? I need to put that together and I didn't see bullet points
for your sections.
Thanks,
Pete
